name: multi-channel-video-sources
description: Streaming multiple video sources on any host

installation.post-message:
[bold]To run this package:[/bold]

1. [green]cd tool-mediasources  [/green]
2. [green]./mediasrc.sh ../videos-480p30[/green] (on macOS and Linux)
3. [green]mediasrc.bat ..\videos-480p30[/green] (on Windows in Powershell)
